Motivated customer service specialist with over 20 years Â experience in a fast-paced, team-based environment high call volume environments.

Company Name â€“ City , State

Also sell products, features and accessories.

Accounts Payable Clerk , 11/2004 to 01/2008
Company Name â€“ City , State
Tempe Schools Credit My primary responsibility was maintaining and auditing.
Union General Ledger accounts, account reconciliations, data entry, posting and reconciling large- volume batch summary transactions,
performing cash accounting journal entries, also maintain records for Accounts Payable prioritize and pay invoices received at the rate of
70-90 invoices paid per week.
I have also handled past due auto, mortgage, credit card unsecured consumer loans, repossessions and bankruptcy accounts and continue
to coach employees on how to handle transactions to these sensitive accounts.
I am experienced with MS Office, mainly MS Excel and Word.
